text: @narendramodi Rt. Honorable PM Narendra Modi ji: I appreciate your leadership  and wisdom. U r managing COVID-19 crisis effectively. To u my humble request is for an immediate meeting with Nepali delegate to resolve long pending Nepal-India boarder issue.
